attributes.action: Treat all despot rulers and dictators as saddam was treated irrespective of the country having oil or weapons of mass destruction.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Robert Mugabe and any other despot ruler or dictator should be disposed of as was Saddam Hussain irrespective of the county's wealth, mineral rights or nuclear threat. All asylum seekers, overstayers and escapees of these regimes to be given automatic asylum until their homeland is safe to return. To this end we should also look at repatriating all the Serbs and Croatians now that their country is safe.
